elements.text: , do you hire content creators outside the U.S ?

text:
*edX is hiring a Content Marketing Strategist (Contractor)* :rocket:

*This is a part-time role.*

*What's the deal?* 

edX, an online learning platform founded by Harvard and MIT and home to over 38 million learners, is looking for a contract content strategist to help scale up content marketing efforts for a key product line: online master's degrees. In this role, you'll report to edX's content marketing manager and collaborate with teammates across marketing and university partners to ideate and create SEO-optimized, engaging content to support our growing portfolio of degree programs. Content creation is a big part of this role, with room to use and expand keyword research skills, manage analysis and reporting, and help up-level our strategy. This is a 30-40 hours a week contract position with the option to extend. Would consider fewer hours for the right candidate. Please include a writing sample in your application and feel free to reach out with any questions. Thanks!

*Learn more and apply here:* <https://bit.ly/3f0uiPH>
